constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 存在一个排列使得每个元素不映射到自身（无自环）
constraints.formal: ∃ permutation q of p such that ∀ k, p_k ≠ q_k

constraints.name: value_constraint
constraints.description: 排列中的每个元素的值满足特定条件（A[q_k] ≥ B[p_k]）

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 所有礼物的价值和不满意阈值各不相同
constraints.formal: A_1, B_1, A_2, B_2, ..., A_N, B_N are all distinct
